app.title: Elekti

landing.title: Fumana Mokga oo o U Lumellanang

about.title: Ka Elekti
about.methodologyText: Elekti e sebedisa mokgwa o pharaletseng, o thehilweng bopaking ho bapisa maikutlo a hao a dipolotiki le mekgatlo ya dipolotiki ya Afrika Borwa. Tsamaiso ya rona e etseditswe ho ba le toka, ho ba pepeneneng, le ho se nke lehlakore.
about.howItWorksText: O araba dipotso tse 28 tse hlophisitsweng ka hloko tse akaretsang dikarolo tse kholo tsa pholisi ho kenyeletswa bophelo bo botle, thuto, moruo, puso le ditaba tsa setjhaba. Potso ka nngwe e etseditswe ho senola dikgetho tsa hao tsa dipolotiki ntle le leeme ho mokgatlo ofe kapa ofe.
about.scoringText: Karabo e nngwe le e nngwe eo o fanang ka yona e bapiswa le maemo a mekgatlo a ngotsweng ho tswa ho dimanifesto tsa semmuso, ditokomane tsa pholisi, le diphatlalatso tsa setjhaba. Mekgatlo e fumana matshwao a lekanyeditsweng ho latela hore na maemo a bona a boletsweng a tsamaellana hakae le dikarabo tsa hao. Matshwao ana a lekanyetswa sekaleng sa 0-100, moo papiso ya hao e ka sehloohong le tse ding di hlwauweng ka ho hlaka. Re boetse re fana ka tekanyo ya tshepo ho o thusa ho utlwisisa hore na papiso ya hao e matla hakae.
about.transparencyText: Maemo ohle a mekgatlo le boima ba matshwao di qetoa ka dipatlisiso tse tebileng tsa ditokomane tsa semmuso tsa mekgatlo. Mokgwa wa rona o bulehile mme o ka hlahlojwa. Ha re rate mokgatlo ofe kapa ofe wa dipolotiki kapa mohopolo - sepheo sa rona feela ke ho o thusa ho etsa diqeto tse nang le tsebo ho latela boleng ba hao le maemo a boletsweng a mekgatlo.
about.dataSourcesText: Maemo a mekgatlo a batlisiswa ka hloko ho tswa ho dimanifesto tsa semmuso tsa mekgatlo, ditokomane tsa pholisi, direkoto tsa ho vouta palamenteng, le diphatlalatso tsa setjhaba tse netefaditsweng. Re ntjhafatsa data ya rona kgafetsa ho bontsha diphetoho tsa pholisi. Disebediswa tsohle tsa mohlodi di tswa dikanaleng tsa semmuso tsa mekgatlo kapa mekgatlong ya ditaba e tshepahalang. Haeba o dumela hore tlhahisoleseding efe kapa efe ha e a nepahala, re amohela ditokiso tse nang le ditokomane tse nepahetseng.
about.privacyText: Lekunutu la hao le bohlokwa haholo. Re dumela hore maikutlo a hao a dipolotiki ke a botho haholo mme a lokelwa ke tshireletso e phahameng ka ho fetisisa.
about.noTrackingText: Ha re sebedise di-cookie, di-pixel tsa analytics, kapa theknoloji efe kapa efe ya ho latedisa. Ha re kgone ho bona dikarabo tsa hao, ha re kgone ho o tseba, mme ha re na thahasello ya ho etsa jwalo. Dikarabo tsa hao tsa dipotso ha di romelwe ho di-server tsa rona.
about.localOnlyText: Tsohle di etsahala ho sebatli sa hao. Dikarabo tsa hao di bolokwa feela sesebedisweng sa hao mme ha ho moo di leng teng hape. Haeba o hlakola data ya sebatli sa hao, diphetho tsa hao di nyametse ka ho sa feleng - ha re na bekapo hobane ha re a ka ra ba le tsona qalong.
about.sharing: Kamoo Ho Arolelana ho Sebetsang Kateng
about.sharingText: Ha o arolelana diphetho, dikarabo tsa hao di kentsoe khoutu ka kotloloho ho sehokelo sa URL ka bosona. Sena se bolela hore mang kapa mang ya nang le sehokelo seo a ka bona diphetho tsa hao, empa data ha e ame di-server tsa rona. O laola hore na ke mang ya bonang diphetho tsa hao ka ho laola hore na ke mang ya fumanang sehokelo seo. Hlakola sehokelo, mme diphetho tsa hao di boela di ba lekunutu hape.
about.analyticsText: Re sebedisa Cloudflare Web Analytics, tshebeletso ya analytics e etelletsang lekunutu pele e sa sebediseng di-cookie, e sa latediseng batho ho phatlalla le diwebsaete, mme e sa bokelleng tlhahisoleseding efe kapa efe e ka tsebang motho. E re fa dipalopalo tsa motheo tse kopaneng (jwalo ka kakaretso ya ho shebwa ha leqephe) ho re thusa ho utlwisisa haeba sebaka sa marang-rang se sebediswa, ntle le ho beha lekunutu la hao kotsing. Cloudflare e sitwa ho bona dikarabo tsa hao tsa dipotso kapa ho o tseba ka bowena.
about.partiesText: Re kenyeletsa mekgatlo e meholo e 14 ya dipolotiki ya Afrika Borwa e emelang maikutlo a fapaneng ho phatlalla le sekhahla sa dipolotiki. Kgetho ya rona e thehilwe ho boemedi ba palamente, bohlokwa ba dikgetho, le ho fapana ha mehopolo.
about.disclaimerText: Elekti ke sesebediswa sa thuto, eseng sebaka sa dipatlisiso. Mekgatlo ya dipolotiki ke mekgatlo e rarahaneng e nang le maemo a fapaneng a fetohang ha nako e ntse e ya. Re o kgothaletsa ka matla ho bala dimanifesto tsa mekgatlo, ho ba teng diforumong tsa setjhaba, le ho netefatsa tlhahisoleseding ya rona ka boikemelo. Sesebediswa sena se bontsha ho tsamaellana ho thehilweng ho maemo a boletsweng - puso ya nnete e ka fapana. Sebedisa diphetho tsena e le qalo ya ho hlahloba ka botebo, eseng e le qeto ya hao ya ho qetela.
about.viewDataText: O ka sheba difaele tsa rona tsa JSON ka botlalo. Difaele tsena tsa JSON di na le maemo ohle a mekgatlo, boima ba matshwao, le metadata ya dipotso tse sebediswang ke algorithm ya rona.
about.scoringData: Data ea Lintlha (e kenyelletsa dipotso le boima)

anc.desc: ANC ke mokga o busang Afrika Borwa o ikemiseditseng phetoho ya setjhaba...

da.desc: DA e matshelong a demokrasi ya tokoloho, moruo o tsamaiswang ke mmaraka...

mk.desc: MK Party e buella phetoho ya moruo e matla e tsamaiswang ke puso...

eff.desc: EFF ke mokga wa leqele le letshwele o buellang phetoho ya moruo...

ifp.desc: IFP e phahamisa setso sa maZulu le puso ya mafapha...

pa.desc: Patriotic Alliance e shebane haholo le taba ya ba kenang ka hare ka bosenyi...

vfplus.desc: VF Plus e emela dithahasello tsa Maafrikaans...

actionsa.desc: ActionSA e shebane le puso e sebetsang hantle le kgolo ya moruo...

acdp.desc: ACDP e phahamisa boleng ba Bokreste le maano a setso...

ufc.desc: Unite for Change e phahamisa boetapele ba setjhaba...

sacp.desc: SACP e buella bonyaka le ditokelo tsa basebetsi...

udm.desc: UDM e phahamisa demokrasi ya setjhaba le maano a sebetsang...

aljamah.desc: Al Jama ah e emela boleng ba Boislamo...

cope.desc: COPE e buella demokrasi ya setjhaba le moruo o leka-lekaneng...

q1.text: NHI kapa tsamaiso ya tlhokomelo ya bophelo e tšehelitsoeng ke puso e lokela ho fana ka tlhokomelo ya bophelo ya motheo mahala ho bohle.

q2.text: Thuto e phahameng e lokela ho ba mahala ho bohle, eseng ka thuso ya dithuso tsa dithuto feela.

q3.text: Puso e lokela ho fana ka motlotlo wa motheo ho bohle, le ha ho ka bolela lekhetho le phahameng kapa ho alima haholo.

q4.text: Puso e lokela ho tsetela ka matla matlo a setjhaba bakeng sa malapa a fokolang.

q5.text: Matlo a setjhaba a lokela ho fuwa pele, le ha ho ka bolela ho fokotsa ditshebeletso tse ding tsa setjhaba.

q6.text: Puso e lokela ho phahamisa lekhetho ho batho ba ruileng ho tshehetsa mananeo a setjhaba.

q7.text: Afrika Borwa e lokela ho sireletsa diindasteri tsa lehae le ha ditheko tsa bareki di ka phahama.

q8.text: Tokelo ya thepa le kgwebo e nyane e lokela ho sireletswa ka matla kgahlanong le ho amohuoa kapa melao e boima.

q9.text: Puso e lokela ho theha mananeo a mesebetsi ya setjhaba ho fokotsa ho hloka mosebetsi.

q10.text: Basebetsi ba lokela ho ba le tokelo e matla ya ho itshengella le ho buisana le dihoho kantle ho ho kenella ha puso.

q11.text: BEE le ditokisetso tsa ho lokisa kgethollo di lokela ho sala e le maano a bohareng a puso.

q12.text: Puso e lokela ho dumella hore mobu o amohuoe ntle le puseletso ya mmaraka ho potlakisa tokiso ya mobu.

q13.text: Ntlafatso ya mahaeng le tshehetso ya temo di lokela ho fuwa chelete e ngata haholo.

q14.text: Naha e lokela ho tsetela haholo mehloling ya eneji e ka tswelang pele ho ena le kgase ya mashala.

q16.text: Molaotheo o lokela ho fetolwa moo ho hlokahalang ho potlakisa phetoho le kabo ya matlotlo.

q17.text: Ho lwantsha bobodu ka matla ho bohlokoa ho feta ho boloka botsitso ba dipolotiki.

q18.text: Boipuso ba makhotla le ba baqosuoa bo lokela ho sireletswa le ha ho ka thibela ho tenyetseha ha puso.

q21.text: Ho fokotsa botlokotsebe, puso e lokela ho thatafatsa dikotlo ho ena le ho shebana haholo le mabaka a jwalo ka bofuma.

q22.text: Ba kenang kahare ka bosenyi ba lokela ho lelekwa mme meedi e tiiswe ho sireletsa mesebetsi le mehlodi.

q23.text: Puso e lokela ho matlafatsa tshehetso ya molao bakeng sa batho ba LGBTQ+ le ho phahamisa ditokelo tsa bona ka mafolofolo.

q15.text: Puso e lokela ho lokisa ditsamaiso tsa metsi le bohloeki ka potlako metseng e senyehileng.

q19.text: Ho hlokahala dibaka tse matla tsa ho thibela state capture ho kenyeletswa melao e thata ya tshehetso ya mekga le kgwebo mmusong.

q20.text: Diporofense le bomasepala ba lokela ho fuwa matla le tjhelete e ngata, le ha ho ka fokotsa matla a puso ya naha.

q24.text: Boleng ba bodumedi bo lokela ho ba le karolo e kgolo ho kaho ya melao le maano a puso.

q25.text: Naha e lokela ho amohela le ho tshehetsa puso ya marena le dikgosi e le karolo ya puso.

q26.text: Puso e lokela ho eketsa tshehetso ya dipuo tsa matsoho thutong, mecheng ya phatlalatso le ditshebeletsong tsa setjhaba.

q27.text: Naha e lokela ho shebana haholo le dikamano tsa lefatshe le kgwebo le EU, US le Afrika ho ena le ho itshetleha ka mehlotlo e meng ya dipolotiki.

q28.text: Puso e lokela ho eketsa matla a ho shebella le ho fumana data bakeng sa puso ya polokeho le tlhabollo ya botlokotsebe, le ha sena se fokotsa lekunutu.

q29.text: Abortion should be legal, publicly funded where necessary, and available on request.

q30.text: The state should prioritise keeping key public utilities (power, water, rail) in public ownership rather than selling them to private firms.

q31.text: The government should actively fund and protect Afrikaans language education and cultural programmes.

q32.text: Government should make active legal and practical accommodations for religious minorities, including Muslim practices and holidays.

q33.text: The government should introduce specific legal protections and targeted support to preserve the rights and cultures of national minorities.

q34.text: The government should prioritise paying down public debt and ensuring fiscal sustainability even if it limits new social spending.

q35.text: Immigration policy should be significantly tightened including stronger border controls and stricter vetting.
